column4: I just upgraded my laptop here to hoary .. is there an xcompmgr package?
ah
excellent, thanks
warty has xorg?
haha i opened the floodgates
mostly the nice thing about it is  a "backing store" that works
like the X backing store never did
some of the tools sometimes ask me for my root password.  I thought that ubuntu didn't have a root password?
my user password doesn't work in such circumstances
that is because it is asking for ROOT, ubuntu doesn't have root enabled by default
yeah
why does ubuntu have stuff that asks for root?
if I run into something like that, I just run it from command, with a sudo in front
yeah, I can get around it easy enough but I was wondering if I was doing something wrong
I don't have ubuntu with me here, I cannot help anymore....sorry
's okay, thanks
does ubuntu's gdm respect ~/.xsession ?
at the log in screen
should be soon, one could assume
what are you burning?
amd64 ubuntu iso
burn ok now?
